column1: in memory of rosemary l. reschly -- yoder-culp funeral home| in memoriam of rosemary l. reschly facts. born: december 1
column5: inmemorial donations can be made to:center for hospice care. sunnyside mennonite church send card. rosemary l. reschly. december 1
column13: at her home after battling cancer since 2006. she was born in goshen on december 1
column14: 1948 to ralph and mary (bollinger) blough. on november 10
column15: 1973 she married rodney reschly. he survives along with two sons
column16: samuel (jeanna) reschly of goshen and michael (kathy) reschly of boulder
column18: brock and alex reschly of goshen and jonah and zoe reschly of boulder
column21: ohio and reggie l. (lonnie haley) blough of cape coral
column22: florida. she was preceded in death by her parents. a lifetime area resident
column23: rosemary was a member of sunnyside mennonite church
column24: elkhart and a 1967 graduate of goshen high school. she worked as an executive assistant at anabaptist mennonite biblical seminary from 1988 until her retirement in 2011. she had also worked at oaklawn from 1969 to 1977. friends may call sunday
column27: from 2 to 6 p. m. at yoder-culp funeral home. a memorial service will be held on monday
column30: starting at 11 a. m. at sunnyside mennonite church. pastors terry zehr and melissa fisher fast will officiate. cremation at yoder-culp crematory will follow the service. memorial contributions may be made to center for hospice care or sunnyside mennonite church.
